# TP Titanic

```{r}
library(carData)
head(TitanicSurvival)
```

# Desciption 
```{r}
summary(TitanicSurvival)
```

# 
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(TitanicSurvival, aes(survived,fill=sex)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge",width = 0.4)+
  theme_minimal()
```
```{r}
ggplot(TitanicSurvival, aes(passengerClass,fill=survived)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge",width = 0.3)
```
```{r}
ggplot(TitanicSurvival, aes(survived,age)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_minimal()
```
